data.eml:eml: Spionidae (Annelida) from shallow waters around the British Islands: an identification guide for the NMBAQC Scheme with an overview of spionid morphology and biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Radashevsky, Vasily I. (2012): Spionidae (Annelida) from shallow waters around the British Islands: an identification guide for the NMBAQC Scheme with an overview of spionid morphology and biology. Zootaxa 3152: 1-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209619
